body: I see; the `__wbg_shims` is in the wrong crate.

issue.title: Fix WASM build
issue.body:
It seems that something ( [this ?](https://github.com/rust-random/rand/pull/676/files) ) introduced in `rand 0.6.3` made it not compile
with WASM target anymore. See [this CDSL build](https://travis-ci.org/balena-io-modules/balena-cdsl/builds/476321230) for the error in the wild and [this temen build](https://travis-ci.org/balena-io-modules/balena-temen/builds/476338024) for a manual re-build of master.

reproduce locally on master:
```
git fetch
git checkout master
git reset --hard origin/master
rm -fr target Cargo.lock
./ci/test.sh
[...]
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `wasm_bindgen`
   --> /home/cyryl/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand-0.6.3/src/lib.rs:729:9
    |
729 |         extern crate wasm_bindgen;
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate

error: aborting due to previous error
```

Needs more investigation as to why exactly this failed, this PR is to just make master compile again.

issue.title: Update `rand` dependency when WASM build issue fixed

labels.name: Pending: Vendor fix
labels.description: Waiting for a fix in an external crate

issue.body:
Issue on rand side: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/issues/682
See also #48

issue.title: rand 0.6.2 is broken on wasm32-unknown-unknown

repository.name: rand
repository.description: A Rust library for random number generation.

issue.body:
The following line is triggered when one compiles `rand` on `wasm32-unknown-unknown`: https://github.com/rust-random/rand/blob/ec634c31bcb814d45ab9e1e1fe3eab3d393c8490/rand_os/src/lib.rs#L339

`rand` doesn't enable neither `stdweb` or `wasm-bindgen` in its `rand_os` dependency, and doesn't have any way of enabling them.

body: @stevebob would you be able to put together a minimal test crate for rand + wasm-bindgen? Currently we can only test builds. It would be good to add full integration testing, e.g. as a crate under the `tests` dir.

so far, are there any good solution, I am facing the same issues  
`Compiling rand_os v0.1.3
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `wasm_bindgen`
   --> /home/xxx/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rand_os-0.1.3/src/lib.rs:138:1
    |
138 | extern crate wasm_bindgen;
    | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate`@stevebob, @dhardy
@rjgeek I think a new issue would be appropriate; this one's quite old. When you do, post the output of `cargo tree` [install from here](https://crates.io/crates/cargo-tree).

As I said, a new issue please. It's not the same cause.

Upgrading to Rand 0.7 may fix it; that said we should try to support version 0.6 too.

The problem is that I want to use "rand04_compat" package.   But "rand04_compat" package does not support Rand 0.7, and I have to back to back to rand 0.6, but rand 0.6 has the above issues.  It made me in a dilemma.

Create a new issue *please*.

If you can reproduce with a small test crate that would be best.
